slide.title: Language Movement veteran Rawshan Ara Bachhu, a comrade of former chief justice Muhammad Habibur Rahman, is the first to pay her respects before his body on the capital's Central Shaheed Minar premises yesterday. Photo: Amran Hossain
She was soon followed by Prof Emeritus Anisuzzaman. Photo: Amran Hossain
Dr Kamal Hossain of Gonoforum follows suit. Photo: Amran Hossain
Lawyers attend the namaz-e-janaza of the chief adviser of the country's first caretaker government on the Supreme Court premises. Photo: Amran Hossain
